def prob_same_color(total_marbles, same_color_marbles):
    return same_color_marbles / total_marbles / ((same_color_marbles - 1) / (total_marbles - 1))

    return same_color_marbles / total_marbles + (same_color_marbles - 1) / (total_marbles - 1)
